articles.author: Michael Stratford
articles.title: Trump says JPMorgan, Bank of America rejected his deposits - Politico
articles.description: The Trump administration is expected to take additional efforts to crack down on perceived bias against conservatives in the financial system.
articles.content: Trumps latest comments come as his administration is considering an executive order on debanking that directs banking regulators to address any politically motivated account closures. The Wall Street… [+3707 chars]
